channel.title: Oscars 2026 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Oscars 2026 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oscar Predictions via Feinberg Forecast: Scott’s First Read of the 2025-2026 Race
item.description: THR’s executive editor of awards coverage offers his initial assessment of the 11 highest profile categories.

item.title: Oscar Predictions via Feinberg Forecast: Scott’s First Read of the 2025-2026 Race
item.description: THR’s executive editor of awards coverage offers his initial assessment of the 11 highest profile categories.

item.title: AMPAS Crowns 2025 Student Academy Award Winners
item.description: All winners will be eligible to compete in the 98th Oscars in the animated short film, live action short film or documentary short film categories.

item.title: AMPAS Crowns 2025 Student Academy Award Winners
item.description: All winners will be eligible to compete in the 98th Oscars in the animated short film, live action short film or documentary short film categories.

item.title: Oscars: Iceland Picks ‘The Love That Remains’ as Best Int’l Feature Submission
item.description: Hlynur Pálmason’s latest film, which captures “a year in the life of a family as parents navigate their separation," is his third Academy Award contender.

item.title: Oscars: Iceland Picks ‘The Love That Remains’ as Best Int’l Feature Submission
item.description: Hlynur Pálmason’s latest film, which captures “a year in the life of a family as parents navigate their separation," is his third Academy Award contender.

item.title: Oscars: Sweden Picks ‘Eagles of the Republic’ as Best Int’l Feature Submission
item.description: Tarik Saleh’s political thriller, starring Fares Fares, Lyna Khoudri and Zineb Triki, is set in the powerful and glamorous Egyptian film industry.

item.title: Oscars: Sweden Picks ‘Eagles of the Republic’ as Best Int’l Feature Submission
item.description: Tarik Saleh’s political thriller, starring Fares Fares, Lyna Khoudri and Zineb Triki, is set in the powerful and glamorous Egyptian film industry.

item.title: Oscars: Norway Picks Joachim Trier’s Family Drama ‘Sentimental Value’ for Best Int’l Feature Race
item.description: Renate Reinsve, Stellan Skarsgard, Elle Fanning, and newcomer Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas star in the feature, which won the Grand Prix honor in Cannes.

item.title: Oscars: Norway Picks Joachim Trier’s Family Drama ‘Sentimental Value’ for Best Int’l Feature Race
item.description: Renate Reinsve, Stellan Skarsgard, Elle Fanning, and newcomer Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas star in the feature, which won the Grand Prix honor in Cannes.

item.title: Oscars: Ireland Picks ‘Sanatorium,’ Doc on Ex-Soviet Wellness Resort in Ukraine, as Best Int’l Feature Submission
item.description: The documentary directed by Gar O’Rourke world premiered at CPH:DOX in Copenhagen.

item.title: Oscars: Ireland Picks ‘Sanatorium,’ Doc on Ex-Soviet Wellness Resort in Ukraine, as Best Int’l Feature Submission
item.description: The documentary directed by Gar O’Rourke world premiered at CPH:DOX in Copenhagen.

item.title: Oscars: Palestine Picks ‘Palestine 36’ as Best International Feature Submission
item.description: Annemarie Jacir’s historical drama, which will premiere at the Toronto Film Festival, tells the story of the Palestinian revolt against British colonial rule.

item.title: Oscars: Palestine Picks ‘Palestine 36’ as Best International Feature Submission
item.description: Annemarie Jacir’s historical drama, which will premiere at the Toronto Film Festival, tells the story of the Palestinian revolt against British colonial rule.

item.title: Oscars: Switzerland Picks Health-Care Drama ‘Late Shift’ as Best International Feature Submission
item.description: ‘September 5’ actress Leonie Benesch stars as an overworked nurse in Petra Volpe’s timely drama.

item.title: Oscars: Switzerland Picks Health-Care Drama ‘Late Shift’ as Best International Feature Submission
item.description: ‘September 5’ actress Leonie Benesch stars as an overworked nurse in Petra Volpe’s timely drama.

item.title: Film Academy’s Submissions Site Opens, Paving Way for Oscar Hopefuls to Hit Members-Only Streaming Service
item.description: Film companies will have to go through a few hoops — and write a check — to take advantage of this pipeline, though.

item.title: Film Academy’s Submissions Site Opens, Paving Way for Oscar Hopefuls to Hit Members-Only Streaming Service
item.description: Film companies will have to go through a few hoops — and write a check — to take advantage of this pipeline, though.
